text: Resident Evil 2, known in Japan as , is a survival horror video game developed and published by Capcom. It is the second game in the Resident Evil series. It inspired a remake. == Gameplay == The game can let players play as either Leon Kennedy or Claire Redfield of S.T.A.R.S. ==Notes== == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1998 video games Category:1990s horror video games Category:Resident Evil Category:Action-adventure games Category:Dreamcast games Category:Nintendo 64 games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:PlayStation games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Sega Saturn games Category:Single-player video games Category:Survival horror video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about police officers Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video games set in the United States Category:Windows games
title: Resident Evil 2 (1998 video game)
